types:type.name: order
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type order = {| OrderID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, CustomerID: String, EmployeeID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, OrderDate: String, RequiredDate: String, ShippedDate: String, ShipVia: Number {"typeId": "int"} |} {"example": "{\\\"OrderID\\\":10250,\\\"CustomerID\\\":\\\"HANAR\\\",\\\"EmployeeID\\\":4,\\\"OrderDate\\\":\\\"1996-07-08 00:00:00\\\",\\\"RequiredDate\\\":\\\"1996-08-05 00:00:00\\\",\\\"ShippedDate\\\":\\\"1996-07-12 00:00:00\\\",\\\"ShipVia\\\":2}"}
